kSpell

Hmm... this seems to be some sort of incantation for a 'Ritual of Unbinding'... To complete the ritual, I need to locate 3 relics belonging to the lost souls of Cutteridge and place them on the correct runes.

Hmm ... cela semble être une sorte d'incantation d'un «rituel de la Libération» ... Pour compléter le rituel, j'ai besoin de trouver 3 reliques appartenant aux âmes perdues de Cutteridge et les placer sur les runes correctes.

Hmm ... dies scheint eine Art Beschwörungsformel für einen 'Ritual des Unverbindliche' ... Um das Ritual zu vervollständigen, muss ich 3 Reliquien gehören zu den verlorenen Seelen Cutteridge finden und legen Sie sie auf den richtigen Runen.

Hmm ... questa sembra essere una sorta di incantesimo per un 'Rituale di liberazione' ... Per completare il rituale, ho bisogno di trovare tre reliquie appartenenti alle anime perdute di Cutteridge e metterli sulle rune corretti.

Hmm ... esto parece ser una especie de conjuro para un "Ritual de Desunión '... Para completar el ritual, tengo que encontrar 3 reliquias pertenecientes a las almas perdidas de Cutteridge y colocarlos en las runas correctas.

kSpellAlt
While I thought I was working to free the trapped spirits of Cutteridge, I unwittingly opened a portal to the infernal realm of a demonic presence.
Pendant que je pensais que je travaillais pour libérer les esprits piégés de Cutteridge, j'ai involontairement ouvert un portail vers le royaume infernal d'une présence démoniaque.
Während ich dachte, ich arbeitete, um die gefangenen Geister Cutteridge befreien, ich unwissentlich öffnete ein Portal zur höllischen Reich eines dämonischen Präsenz.
Quando pensavo che stavo lavorando lavoravo per liberare gli spiriti intrappati di Cutteridge, ho involontariamente aperto un portale al regno infernale di una presenza demoniaca.
Mientras yo pensaba que estaba trabajando para liberar a los espíritus atrapados de Cutteridge, yo sin querer abrir un portal al reino infernal de una presencia demoníaca.
While I thought I was working to free the trapped spirits of Cutteridge, I unwittingly opened a portal to the infernal realm of a demonic presence.
While I thought I was working to free the trapped spirits of Cutteridge, I unwittingly opened a portal to the infernal realm of a demonic presence.
While I thought I was working to free the trapped spirits of Cutteridge, I unwittingly opened a portal to the infernal realm of a demonic presence.

While I thought I was working to free the trapped spirits of Cutteridge, I unwittingly opened a portal to the infernal realm of a demonic presence.
kEditha
I can't seem to find any information on what happened to Mr. and Mrs. Cutteridge.
Je n'arrive pas a trouver aucune information sur ce qui est arrivé à M. et Mme Cutteridge.
Ich kann nicht scheinen, um irgendwelche Informationen darüber, was passiert ist Mr. and Mrs. Cutteridge finden.
Mi pare che non posso trovare nessun’ informazione su ciò che è successo a signor e signora Cutteridge.
Me parece que no puede encontrar ninguna información sobre lo que pasó con el señor y la señora Cutteridge.

kEdithaAlt
Editha had been attempting to summon the evil being with the murders of Clara, Jasper and her own daughter, Jessamine.
Editha avait tenté d'appeler le mal être avec les meurtres de Clara, Jasper et sa propre fille, Jessamine.
Editha hatte versucht, beschwören das Böse Wesen mit den Morden an Clara, Jasper und ihre eigene Tochter, Jessamine.
Editha cercava di chiamare il malevalo con gli omicidi di Clara, Jasper e la sua figlia, Jessamine.
Editha había estado tratando de reunir el mal estar con el asesinato de Clara, Jasper y su propia hija, Jessamine.
Editha had been attempting to summon the evil being with the murders of Clara, Jasper and her own daughter, Jessamine.

kThomas
Both Thomas and Editha seem to have vanished from the Estate at roughly the same time.
Thomas et Editha semblent avoir disparu du manoir à peu près au même moment.
Sowohl Thomas und Editha scheint aus dem Nachlass in etwa zur gleichen Zeit verschwunden.
Sia Thomas e Editha sembra essere svanita dalla Tenuta più o meno nello stesso momento
Tanto Thomas y Editha parecen haber desaparecido de la finca o menos al mismo tiempo.

kJessamine
Jessamine disappeared from the Estate shortly after the groundskeeper, Jasper. People seemed to believe she drowned, but her body was never recovered...
Jessamine disparu du manoir peu de temps après le jardinier, Jasper. Les gens croyaient qu'elle se noie, mais son corps n'a jamais été retrouvé ...
Jessamine verschwand aus der Villa kurz nach dem Platzwart, Jasper. Die Menschen glaubten, sie ertrank, aber ihr Körper wurde nie gefunden ...
Jessamine scomparso dalla casa poco dopo il giardiniere, Jasper. La gente credeva che annegata, ma il suo corpo non fu mai ritrovato ...
Jessamine desaparecido de la mansión poco después de que el jardinero, de Jasper. La gente cree que se ahogó, pero su cuerpo nunca fue recuperado ...
Jessamine disappeared from the Estate shortly after the groundskeeper, Jasper. People seemed to believe she drowned, but her body was never recovered...
Jessamine disappeared from the Estate shortly after the groundskeeper, Jasper. People seemed to believe she drowned, but her body was never recovered...
Jessamine disappeared from the Estate shortly after the groundskeeper, Jasper. People seemed to believe she drowned, but her body was never recovered...
Jessamine disappeared from the Estate shortly after the groundskeeper, Jasper. People seemed to believe she drowned, but her body was never recovered...
Jessamine disappeared from the Estate shortly after the groundskeeper, Jasper. People seemed to believe she drowned, but her body was never recovered...
Jessamine disappeared from the Estate shortly after the groundskeeper, Jasper. People seemed to believe she drowned, but her body was never recovered...
kJessamineAlt
I found where Jessamine had hidden her doll. She seemed to think someone wished her harm, but I'm not sure who.
J'ai trouvé où Jessamine avait caché sa poupée. Elle avait l'air de penser que quelqu'un voulait lui nuire, mais je ne sais pas qui.
Ich fand, wo Jessamine hatte ihre Puppe versteckt. Sie schien zu glauben, dass jemand wünschte ihr schaden, aber ich bin mir nicht sicher, wer.
Ho trovato dove Jessamine aveva nascosto la sua bambola. Sembrava che ella pensava che qualcuno voleva farla del male, ma non sono sicuro chi.
Me pareció que Jessamine había escondido su muñeca. Parecía que alguien quería hacerle daño, pero no estoy seguro de quién.
I found where Jessamine had hidden her doll. She seemed to think someone wished her harm, but I'm not sure who.
I found where Jessamine had hidden her doll. She seemed to think someone wished her harm, but I'm not sure who.
I found where Jessamine had hidden her doll. She seemed to think someone wished her harm, but I'm not sure who.
I found where Jessamine had hidden her doll. She seemed to think someone wished her harm, but I'm not sure who.
I found where Jessamine had hidden her doll. She seemed to think someone wished her harm, but I'm not sure who.
I found where Jessamine had hidden her doll. She seemed to think someone wished her harm, but I'm not sure who.
kClara
Clara had a reputation for being a dour spirit and was rarely seen outside of the kitchen. She disappeared from the Estate one night before dinner.
Clara avait la réputation d'être austère et elle a été rarement vu en dehors de la cuisine. Elle a disparu du manoir un soir avant le dîner.
Clara hatte den Ruf, mürrischen und sie war selten außerhalb der Küche. Sie verschwand aus der Villa eine Nacht vor dem Abendessen.
Clara aveva la reputazione di essere cupo ed era raramente visto al di fuori della cucina. E 'scomparsa da casa una sera prima di cena.
Clara tenía la reputación de ser severo y se la vio rara vez fuera de la cocina. Desapareció de la mansión una noche antes de la cena.
Clara had a reputation for being a dour spirit and was rarely seen outside of the kitchen. She disappeared from the Estate one night before dinner.
Clara had a reputation for being a dour spirit and was rarely seen outside of the kitchen. She disappeared from the Estate one night before dinner.
Clara had a reputation for being a dour spirit and was rarely seen outside of the kitchen. She disappeared from the Estate one night before dinner.
Clara had a reputation for being a dour spirit and was rarely seen outside of the kitchen. She disappeared from the Estate one night before dinner.
Clara had a reputation for being a dour spirit and was rarely seen outside of the kitchen. She disappeared from the Estate one night before dinner.
Clara had a reputation for being a dour spirit and was rarely seen outside of the kitchen. She disappeared from the Estate one night before dinner.
kClaraAlt
I recovered what I believe is the charred skull of Clara the maid. It seems she never left the kitchen after all...
J'ai récupéré ce que je crois est le crâne carbonisé de la femme de chambre, Clara. Il semble qu'elle n'a jamais quitté la cuisine, après tout ...
Ich erholte mich, was ich glaube ist die verkohlten Schädel Clara die Magd. Es scheint sie nie verließ die Küche, nachdem alle ...
Ho ricuperato quello che mi credo che e il craneo carbonizado de la doncella, Clara. Dopo tutto, sembra che ella non a mai lasciato la cucina.
Me recuperé lo que creo que es el cráneo carbonizado de la doncella, Clara. Parece que ella nunca salió de la cocina después de todo ...
I recovered what I believe is the charred skull of Clara the maid. It seems she never left the kitchen after all...
I recovered what I believe is the charred skull of Clara the maid. It seems she never left the kitchen after all...
I recovered what I believe is the charred skull of Clara the maid. It seems she never left the kitchen after all...

kJasper

Jasper served in the Civil War and was never the same after. He was rarely seen without his reaping scythe in hand, whether it was harvest time or not... He vanished into the fields sometime after the maid, Clara, disappeared.

Jasper a servi dans la Guerre d'indépendance des États-Unis et n'a jamais été le même depuis. Il a été rarement vu sans sa faux récoltent à la main, qu'il s'agisse du moment de la récolte ou pas ... il a disparu dans les champs pas loin après la femme de chambre, Clara, a disparu.

Jasper diente in der Sezessionskrieg und war nie das gleiche nach. Er war nur selten ohne seine ernten Sense in der Hand zu sehen, ob es Erntezeit war oder nicht ... Er verschwand in den Bereichen irgendwann nach der Magd, Clara, verschwunden.

Jasper a servito nella guerra di secessione americana e non è mai stato lo stesso dopo. Lo vidavano raramente senza la sua falce in mano, si era tempo di raccolto o no ... è disparuto nei campi un poco dopo è scomparita la cameriera, Clara.

Jasper sirvió en la Guerra de Secesión y nunca fue el mismo después. Fue visto raramente sin su guadaña siega en la mano, si era el momento de la cosecha o no ... desapareció en los campos en algún momento después de la limpieza, Clara, desapareció.

Jasper served in the Civil War and was never the same after. He was rarely seen without his reaping scythe in hand, whether it was harvest time or not... He vanished into the fields sometime after the maid, Clara, disappeared.

Jasper served in the Civil War and was never the same after. He was rarely seen without his reaping scythe in hand, whether it was harvest time or not... He vanished into the fields sometime after the maid, Clara, disappeared.

kJasperAlt
Jasper's spirit chased me through a confusing maze of... maize, but I managed to find his scythe and escape.
L'esprit de Jasper m'a pourchassé à travers un dédale difficile de ... maïs, mais j'ai réussi à trouver sa faux et m'échapper. Ce doit être l'une des reliques que je cherche.
Jasper Geist jagte mich durch ein verwirrendes Labyrinth von ... Mais, aber ich schaffte es seine Sense und die Flucht zu finden. Dies hat zu einer der Reliquien, die ich suche sein.
Lo spirito di Jasper mi ha sequito attraverso un laborinto confuso di mais, ma ho riuscito a trovare la sua falce e ho scappato. Questo dev’essere una delle reliquie che cerco.
El espíritu de Jasper me persiguieron a través de un laberinto confuso de maíz, pero me las arreglé para encontrar a su guadaña y escapar. Esto tiene que ser una de las reliquias que quiero.
Jasper's spirit chased me through a confusing maze of... maize, but I managed to find his scythe and escape.
Jasper's spirit chased me through a confusing maze of... maize, but I managed to find his scythe and escape.
